text:
Hello everyone!

I'm looking at the data we get and I see `"local_time_zone": "Europe/London"`  although I am in Spain. Why is this the case and how can I get the local time zone of a user visiting our website?

I want this info to be able to display the events time in local time zone of the user.

Thanks,
Stefi

Hello everyone!
Do you know how is the reading on this report? Why it’s showing 0 after the first stage and what is the date the report uses?
